title: Efficient Customs Clearance
description: In 2023, North Macedonia achieved an average customs clearance time for exports of just 1.1 days, showcasing its efficiency in facilitating international trade.

title: Decline in Service Sector Growth
description: The service sector in North Macedonia experienced a significant contraction in 2023, with an annual growth rate of -100%, indicating challenges in this economic segment.

title: Low Mortality from Communicable Diseases
description: In 2019, only 1.28% of deaths in North Macedonia were due to communicable diseases, maternal, prenatal, and nutrition conditions, reflecting strong public health measures.

title: High Mortality from Non-Communicable Diseases
description: A significant 96.13% of deaths in 2019 were attributed to non-communicable diseases, highlighting a major public health concern in North Macedonia.

title: Equitable Income Distribution
description: In 2019, the fourth 20% income share in North Macedonia was 24.8%, suggesting a relatively equitable distribution of income among the population.

title: Complete Urban Birth Registration
description: North Macedonia achieved a 100% completeness rate for urban birth registration in 2019, ensuring all births are officially recorded and recognized.
